topic.title: Suicide Attempt Or Completion - conformance rules

lines.i: This class is used to specify past incidents of suicide attempt.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] ICDcode with data type Code
This coded attribute is used to specify the means by which suicide was attempted. The attribute name implies that an ICD-9 code is used to specify this information. Is this the case?

Contains exactly one [1..1] statusCode with data type Code
This coded attribute is used to specify if the suicide attempt was successful/completed, aborted, or otherwise unsuccessful.

Contains exactly one [1..1] ICDcode with data type Code
This coded attribute is used to specify the means by which suicide was attempted. The attribute name implies that an ICD-9 code is used to specify this information. Is this the case?

Contains exactly one [1..1] statusCode with data type Code
This coded attribute is used to specify if the suicide attempt was successful/completed, aborted, or otherwise unsuccessful.
